column5: These look like some great baits   Water Wolf Lures
Nice looking Jigs Brian,and how many do you have :dunnoThet would work for any other fish as well.I could see a huge Walleye on one right now.  Steve
It just got out there Steve. Just another bait for you guys to throw around.LOL
Do they come in 11", lol, still to small for me.  Perfect for Pike though.

Available in 12" (Shadzilla) and 9" (Shadzilla Jr)  The soft plastic Shadzilla can be use for trolling or casting. The tail action has a very unique action. Rather than the normal side to side movement you might normally see on a pogy tail style swimbait, the Shadzilla tail actually rotates and causes the body to roll back and forth mimicking a swimming baitfish. We also produce the 7" version without a jighead.  12" Shadzilla - $16.99 9" Shadzilla - $10.99   will that do
LOL, missed that one Terry, looks good to me.
It's a new website, I know, but I think it's strange that they are pitching their products to the esox fans but the gallery shows only some fine lookin salvelinuses.
The company had a booth at the Odyessy.  Nice product, also carry a lot of bass lures. ie: Bass Magnet Lure Co.  John
Brian,the thought never crossed my mind bud.  Steve
Yea I know Steve.Sorry bud,just had a moment and I withdrawed my comment.
look yummy.  Remember to have a flame thrower of some sort to re-attach tail after first chomp, otherwise makes for a pricy disposable bait.
